sentences.sContent: There is always a clamorous din when I go to visit my father.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is always a clamorous din when I go to visit my father.
sentences.sCn: 每当我去看视父亲的的时候，总有一个声音在那里大喊大叫。

sentences.sContent: The silent night has the beauty of the mother and the clamorous day of the child.
sentences.sContent_eng: The silent night has the beauty of the mother and the clamorous day of the child.
sentences.sCn: 静悄悄的黑夜具有母亲的美丽，而吵闹的白天具有孩子的美丽。

words.tran: 吵闹的；喧嚷的；紧急的；非常需要注意的
喧嚷，发喧嚣声；持续地喊声
